title: Salma Hayek Embraces Her Body With Amazing Bikini Pic On 53rd Birthday
text:
Salma Hayek is living her best life at 53-year-old and proving that age is just a number as she shows off her rocking bod.

The “How to Be a Latin Lover” star shared a stunning bikini picture a few hours ahead of her 53rd birthday with the caption, “Yes, tomorrow I’m 53. So!? Si, mañana cumplo 53. Y!?”

She made sure to include lots of dancing lady and champagne emojis.

Salma's Famous Friends

The star never looked better, which was exactly the opinion of her famous friend, Lenny Kravitz, who commented, “and it never looked so good!!!!!”

You know that you have real pull in Hollywood if you can get a few A-listers wishing you a happy birthday and a bunch showed Salma love; including Pierce Brosnan, Zoe Saldana and Cindy Crawford.

View photos

“Happy birthday dear Salma,” Brosnan wrote. The two are very friendly and have starred in a couple movies together, most notably “Some Kind of Beautiful” in 2014.

Saldana said, “Wowowowow,” and Crawford left several fire emojis.

The post was so awesome that Hayek even had to comment: “Happy Birthday to all of you September babies. Feliz cumpleaños a todos ustedes que también cumplen en Septiembre.”

Thinking of Others on Her Birthday

View photos

On her birthday, Hayek also took time out of her day to send Kevin Hart her well wishes.

She posted a black and white photo of Salma hugging Kevin and included the words, “we love you and we are praying for you.”

The photo appears to be from 2015 when Salma and Hart presented together at the Golden Globes.

Hart recently was involved in a bad car accident and underwent back surgery.

Sources close to Hart tell The Blast he went under the knife Sunday night, and that, "the surgery went smoothly, and he is doing ok."
